## Merge type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Merge<A, B> = {
    [K in keyof A | keyof B]?: K extends keyof A & keyof B ? [A[K], B[K]] extends [object, object] ? Merge<A[K], B[K]> : A[K] | B[K] : K extends keyof A ? A[K] : K extends keyof B ? B[K] : never;
};
```
